title: Qui vs Que
description: Practice distinguishing between 'qui' and 'que' in French.

questions.question: L'homme ___ parle est mon ami.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of 'parle'.

questions.question: Le film ___ tu as regardé était génial.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of 'as regardé'.

questions.question: La femme ___ travaille ici est gentille.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of 'travaille'.

questions.question: Les enfants ___ nous avons vus étaient heureux.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of 'avons vus'.

questions.question: Le professeur ___ explique la leçon est très patient.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of 'explique'.

questions.question: La voiture ___ j'ai achetée est rouge.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of 'ai achetée'.

questions.question: Le livre ___ est sur la table est à moi.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of 'est'.

questions.question: Les amis ___ je rencontre souvent sont gentils.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of 'rencontre'.
